price: 38. Caadna (waan halaagnay) iyo Thamuud iyo qoladii Ar-Rass17 iyo qaaruumo intaas u dhexeeya oo badan.
arabic: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا
footnotes: 17. Ar-Rass wuxuu ahaa ceel la yaqaan oo caan ah oo biyuhu ka gureen. Waxaa la yidhi dadkii ceelkan waxay ahaayeen dadkii beeniyey Nabi Shucayb.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waʿādan wathamūdā wa-aṣḥāba al-rasi waqurūnan bayna dhālika kathīran
